pipeline: PaM Info RVI viral metagenomics pipeline

monochrome_logs.help_text: Should logs appear in plain ASCII

skip_preprocessing.help_text: Should reads pre-processing (including Kneaddata or just Trimmomatic) be run at all? Relevant if pre-processing is done upstream in a separate pipeline.

metaspades_subsample_limit.help_text: minimum number of reads (in a single paired-end read file, so double that for total counts when summing from both files) to trigger read subsampling ahead of any pipeline step, including pre-processing.

cleanup_intermediate_files_irods_extract.help_text: delete intermediate CRAM files downloaded from IRODS in work/ folder

preexisting_fastq_tag.help_text:
if the expected ouput fastq files exist in the folder named like this under the result folder for the sample e.g. in results/12345_1#67/trimmed_reads/12345_1#67_1.fastq.gz,
            then skip download and any further processing for this sample. Default value 'trimmed_reads' means the run skips items for which the output for the PREPROCESSING subworkflow already exists.

split_sep_for_ID_from_fastq.help_text: separator to recognise sample ID from preexisting file.

instrain_profile_options.help_text: profiling parameters for inStrain standard abundance estimation method; default for RVI pipeline is '--min_genome_coverage 0 --min_read_ani 0.9', not '--database-mode'.

subsample_limit.help_text: minimum number of total reads (i.e. summing counts in both paired-end read files) to trigger read subsampling ahead of metagenomic assembly

genome_file_abundance_estimation.help_text: reference genome database for mapping with Bowtie2 prior to abundance estimation with inStrain (mandatory).

precomputed_index_abundance_estimation.help_text: Pre-computed Bowtie2 index for reference genome database prior to abundance estimation with inStrain (mandatory).

stb_file_abundance_estimation.help_text: 'Scaffold-to-Bin' table (matches assembly accessions with contig sequence accessions) for inStrain.

custom_taxon_names_abundance_estimation.help_text: dictionary of taxon names (as provided in value field of STB file --stb_file_abundance_estimation) to custom names, used for ad-hoc relabelling. A 2-column TSV format expected; this may only feature a subset of taxa included in the database.

metaspades_base_mem_gb.help_text: memmory in GB from which the METASPADES process will start iterating, doubling at every retry when failed for insufficient memory
